TEXT.TITLE: NYFE SEAT SELLS FOR 200 DLRS
TEXT.BODY: The New York Stock Exchange said a seat on the New York Futures Exchange sold for 200 dlrs, unchanged from the previous sale on Tuesday. The Exchange said the current bid is 100 dlrs and the offer is 200 dlrs. Reuter
